info.name: SIB Tasks
info.description: This API is made to fulfill the assignment from PT. Arkatama Multisolusindo in FWD SIB program.

query.description: Number of items in a page
If provided with 1, response will not be paginated

item.name: Task

query.description: Filter task by status. Recognized status values are "New", "On Progress", and "Finish". Other values will be ignored
If provided with 1, response will not be paginated.
Return tasks with its other relations. Task has a category relation

query.description: Return task with its other relation. Task has a category relation.
Return task with its other relation. Task has a category relation.

response.name: Invalid Request Body

item.description:
This collection manages tasks.

Note: to upload a file, HTTP Content-Type must be set to multipart/form-data. Thus, POST and PUT must use multipart/form-data content-type to upload files. PATCH is not required to use multipart/form-data if there is no need for file upload.
